page.title: 16GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Every Monday the Guides meet at Headlands School from 7.30 to 9pm. The uniform is a dark blue skirt and a blue blouse and gold tie.Yesterday we did tin can cooking.We needed a candle, a tin, some bacon and lard, then we cooked the bacon. We have to do at least two badges a year.I am doing two now. I am in Snowdrop patrol with five other girls. Next week we are going to have a party,I am going to bake some biscuits. I like guides because of all the trips we go on.In September some of the Guides are going to a fun day at Harrogate Showground.
